title: Swift
description: Swift is a general-purpose programming language that's approachable for newcomers and powerful for experts.

items.title: Swift - GeeksforGeeks
items.description: Swift is a powerful general-purpose programming language developed by Apple to create iOS applications such as for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and so on.

items.title: Swift - Programiz
items.description: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language developed by Apple. It is used to create apps for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and so on. Swift code is concise yet expressive (easier to understand and write).
